text: Peter Norfolk is the defending champion, but he lost in the final 6–0, 2–6, 6–3, against David Wagner. ==Draw== ===Final=== ===Round Robin=== Standings are determined by: #Number of wins #Number of matches #Head-to-head records #Percentage of sets won, or of games won #Steering Committee decision. ==Other websites== * Official site of US Open Wheelchair Quad Singles
title: 2010 US Open – Wheelchair Quad Singles
